attributes.action: Stop fat cat salaries and bankers bonunes
attributes.additional_details:
Listen to the Swiss general public,they like lots of Brits are fed up with salaries over £250,000 pa and stupid bankers bonuses.the gap  between those on the bottom and above is indecent.
Listen or lose the next election.Ukip will go from strength to strength unless you address
Waste in Common market,
Fat cat salaries and bonuses,
Immigration,
Interventions in our justice system from Court of Human Rights.
Trying to police the world and not dealing efficiently with problems at home.
